rules_text:
This spell can't be countered.
When Apex Films Dealbroker enters, target opponent reveals their hand. Exile a nonland card revealed this way until Apex Films Dealbroker leaves the battlefield.
When Apex Films Dealbroker dies, target opponent discards a card. [i](After returning the exiled card.)[/i]
notes:
!tag Motley Oak Vista
!tag Endless Ambition Combo
